author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: mobile-only UI — hide desktop chrome, add year picker and Joyride tour

On mobile (≤768px), hides header, Take Tour button, PhanGraphs link,
"Jamchart Analysis" heading, tab bar, and description. Renders only
SongDeepDiveMobile with integrated year picker in the sticky header.
Adds a 6-step mobile Joyride tour covering year picker, song picker,
sort pills, baseball card, filter pills, and performance cards.
Also defaults mobile to Jamcharts filter and removes Has Clip filter.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: link all 144 PJJ songs to song_tracks (up from top 25)

Remove TOP_25 filter, add 6 remaining song name mappings.
2,756 jams imported, 2,621 song_tracks rows now have jam_url.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add jam clip playback to Song Deep Dive chart

- Add jam_url field to TrackRow (denormalized from pjj_jams)
- Green play triangles on chart dots that have PJJ jam clips
- Click any dot with a jam to stream audio from PhishJustJams
- Fixed-bottom mini player bar with stop button and song/date info
- Tooltip shows "Click to play jam clip" hint for available jams
- Legend updated with play icon indicator
- 1,698 of 13,624 tracks have jam clips (top 25 songs)
- Update import script to denormalize jam_url into song_tracks
- Re-export tracks.json with jam_url field

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add PJJ jam import script with normalized SQLite schema

Imports PhishJustJams CSV data into 4 normalized tables:
- pjj_jams: 1775 jam clips (top 25 songs, 2009+)
- pjj_tags: 39 tag definitions across both playlist CSVs
- pjj_jam_tags: many-to-many join (2403 links)
- pjj_song_map: PJJ abbreviation → song_tracks full name

93% of jams link to existing song_tracks via date+name join.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
chore: deciduous sync after aggregation enhancement

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: shell UI with aggregation modes and extended filters

Update usePhanGraphs hook to use computeAggregatedLeaderboard with
career/byYear/byTour support. Add venue, state, country, and run
position filter dropdowns. Derive available venues/states from
year-filtered tracks. URL params sync for all new filter dimensions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: leaderboard refactor with career/byYear/byTour aggregation

Extract computeLeaderboardFromTracks for reuse, add
computeAggregatedLeaderboard that splits tracks into buckets
(career/year/tour) and runs the full pipeline per bucket so all
stats are scoped to each aggregation period. 12 new tests (312 total).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: Extended filterTracks with venue/state/country/runPosition (13 new tests)

Add venue, state, country, and run position (N1-N5/opener/closer)
filter clauses. Uses location-utils for state/country parsing and
venue-runs for run position detection.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: Extended filter types with neutral defaults

Add AggregationKey, AggregatedLeaderboardEntry, RunPositionFilter.
Extend PhanGraphsFilter with venue, state, country, runPosition,
aggregation fields. All new defaults are neutral (null/all/career)
so existing 287 tests pass unchanged.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: Tour classifier with season-based labels (19 tests)

identifyTours groups shows into tours by gap > 5 days. seasonLabel
assigns names: Summer/Fall/Winter/Spring/NYE + year. Disambiguates
multiple tours per season with (1)/(2). buildTourDateMap for lookups.
Adds TourInfo type to types.ts.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: Venue runs classifier for multi-night run detection (8 tests)

classifyVenueRuns maps show_date → VenueRunInfo with position in run,
opener/closer flags. Groups consecutive calendar dates at same venue.
Adds VenueRunInfo type to types.ts.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: Location utils for state/country parsing (17 tests)

parseState, isUSLocation, extractUniqueStates, extractUniqueVenues.
Handles US "City, ST" and international "City, Province, Country" formats.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
chore: deciduous sync after PhanGraphs implementation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: WARSparkline D3 component in leaderboard

Tiny SVG sparkline showing WAR trend by year per song.
Green area fill for positive WAR, red for negative.
End dot highlights most recent year.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: React Router + PhanGraphs page with leaderboard

- Install react-router-dom, add BrowserRouter to main.tsx
- PhanGraphsPage with sortable leaderboard table, WAR heat coloring
- usePhanGraphs hook: loads tracks, computes leaderboard, URL param sync
- Filter controls: year range, set split, min plays/shows/JC
- 404.html for GH Pages SPA routing
- Nav link from main app to /phangraphs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: Filters + leaderboard orchestrator (28 tests)

Filters: year range, set split (set1/set2/set3/encore), positional
(opener/closer via min/max position per set per show), qualification
thresholds (min plays/shows/JC/minutes).
Leaderboard: end-to-end pipeline TrackRow[] + filter → LeaderboardEntry[].
Barrel export index.ts for all phangraphs modules.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: WAR + JIS computation (29 tests)

WAR: 20th percentile replacement level per year, career/per-play/per-show WAR,
peak year identification, yearly breakdown.
JIS: Normalize per-performance PVS to 0-10 scale, per-song avg/peak/volatility.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test + implement PVS engine with all scoring components

Performance Value Score computed per-performance: z-score length
component (1.5x), jam bonus (JC+20min+25min), bustout value by
gap tier, set leverage (opener/closer/encore with set multiplier),
run leverage (halloween/nye/dicks/festival/yemsg), rarity component.
Full computeAllPVS orchestrator. 27 tests pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test + implement rate-stats with median utility

Rate stats derived from counting stats: jam rate, 20+/25+ rate,
bustout rate, plays/show, jam/show, avg/median length. Includes
standalone median function. 12 tests pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test + implement counting-stats with bustout detection

Per-song aggregation: shows appeared, times played, JC count,
20+/25+ minute thresholds, total minutes, bustout counts by
show gap tiers (25+/50+/100+/250+), max/avg gap. 15 tests pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test + implement run-classifier for show type detection

Classify shows as halloween/nye/dicks/festival/yemsg/regular by
date and venue pattern matching. Priority chain ensures correct
classification (e.g. MSG on Dec 30 = NYE, not YEMSG). 20 tests pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test + implement PhanGraphs types and show-index

Add type contracts for the entire PhanGraphs computation pipeline:
ShowIndex, RunType, BustoutTier, SongCountingStats, SongRateStats,
PVS, WAR, JIS, LeaderboardEntry, PhanGraphsFilter. Implement
buildShowIndex for ordered show date indexing (gap computation).
7 tests pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
wire Venue Power, Jam Evolution, Song Pairings tabs into App

Add 3 new tabs to the Jamchart Analysis section: Venue Power
Rankings, Jam Evolution Timeline, and Song Pairings network graph.
Update Joyride tour with 3 new steps and fix step-to-tab mapping.
Clean up URL params when switching away from song-pairings tab.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
add SongPairings force-directed network graph component

D3 force simulation showing songs that get jammed together.
Thicker links = more co-occurrences. Node size by total connections.
Draggable nodes, hover tooltips, adjustable min-shows slider with
URL param persistence.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
add JamEvolution timeline chart component

D3 line chart showing jam metrics over years: JC per show, total
jamcharts, or avg jam duration. Hover tooltips show yearly stats
and new jam vehicles. Annotations mark years with new vehicles.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
add VenueRankings horizontal bar chart component

D3 horizontal bar chart showing top 30 venues by jamchart count.
Darker bars indicate higher jamchart rate. Hover tooltips with
venue details, show count, and avg track duration.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
wire venue stats, jam evolution, song pairings into data layer

Add SQLite queries to sqlite-plugin.ts, client-side wrappers in
static-queries.ts (reusing pure functions from track-queries.ts),
and data-source.ts abstraction functions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test + implement pure track query functions

Add computeVenueStats, computeJamEvolution, and computeSongPairings
as pure functions over TrackRow arrays. All 13 tests pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add URL parameterization for shareable links

All view state syncs to URL search params via replaceState:
- tab: active jamchart tab (vehicles, heat-calendar, positions, rankings, deep-dive)
- year: year filter (all = omitted)
- song: selected song name (deep-dive tab)
- sort: sort mode - avg/jc/played (deep-dive tab)
- min: minimum times played threshold (deep-dive tab)
- color: heat calendar color mode - jc/pct/duration

Params are cleaned up when switching tabs. Tour auto-skips if user
arrived via a shared link (has URL params).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add Show Heat Calendar — GitHub-style heatmap of jam density per show

New visualization showing every Phish 3.0 show as a cell in a calendar
heatmap. Darker red = more jamcharts that night. Color by jamchart count,
jamchart rate, or total jam time. Hover for venue/show details. Instantly
reveals hot tours, legendary runs, and the all-time heaters.

Added as new "Show Heat" tab, kept Set Positions as its own tab. Updated
Joyride tour with a new step for the heat calendar.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add guided tour with react-joyride for first-time visitors

8-step tour walks through each Jamchart Analysis tab and the Song Deep
Dive controls. Auto-switches tabs as the tour progresses. Stores
completion in localStorage so it only shows once. "Take Tour" button
lets users replay it anytime.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add GitHub Pages static site with GH Actions deployment

- Export song_tracks (13,624 tracks) as data/tracks.json for static hosting
- Add client-side query engine (static-queries.ts) that mirrors server API
- Add data-source.ts abstraction layer (API in dev, client-side in static)
- VITE_PUBLIC_MODE=true hides personal stats, shows only Jamchart Analysis
- Vite base path set to /phstats/ for GH Pages
- GH Actions workflow builds and deploys on push to main

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
fix: dedup songs by song_name instead of song_slug

phish.in uses multiple slugs for the same song (e.g., tweezer, tweezer-2,
tweezer-3 for split segments). Changed querySongList to GROUP BY song_name,
querySongHistory to filter by song_name, and SongDeepDive to use song_name
as the selection key. This eliminates duplicate entries in dropdowns.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: wire all visualizations into App with tabbed sections and year picker

User Comparisons section with 6 tabs (treemap, scatter, timeline, year compare,
radar, song gaps). Jamchart Analysis section with 4 tabs (jam vehicles, set
position map, rankings, song deep dive) and year picker that filters all tabs.
Fetches jamchart data, comparison data, and all-shows data in parallel.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add jamchart, song history, and song list API endpoints with year filtering

New endpoints: /api/jamchart-songs, /api/jamchart-positions, /api/jamchart-years,
/api/song-list, /api/song-history, /api/all-shows, /api/compare-songs. Jamchart
and song queries switched from performances to song_tracks table (all 678 3.0
shows). All jamchart/song endpoints accept ?year= param for per-year analysis.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add Song Deep Dive component and phish.in track scraping

SongDeepDive shows duration timeline with jamchart markers, venue tooltips,
and jam notes for any song. Includes song picker with batting average sort,
min-played filter, and year filtering. Scripts fetch track data from phish.in
API v2 into song_tracks SQLite table (13,624 tracks across 678 Phish 3.0 shows).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add jamchart analysis visualizations

JamVehicleScatter (bubble plot of jam vehicles vs staples),
JamchartPositionMap (set position heatmap), JamchartRankings
(sortable horizontal bar chart). Not yet wired into App.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add 6 user comparison visualizations with tabbed navigation

SongHeatmap reworked with user picker, split-color bands, and tooltips.
New components: SongScatter (taste comparison), ShowTimeline (shared shows),
YearCompare (grouped bars), RadarChart (stat spider), SongGaps (recommendations).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: add D3 song comparison heatmap and multi-user support

- /api/users endpoint lists all scraped users
- /api/compare-songs returns song x user matrix (deduplicated per show)
- D3.js heatmap renders song counts with YlOrRd color scale
- User selector dropdown when multiple users are in the DB
- Heatmap auto-loads when 2+ users available

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
fix: deduplicate song counts per show, not per performance row (green)

computeSongFrequency now counts distinct shows per song using a
Set<showDate>. SQL queryTopSongs uses subquery with GROUP BY
song_name, show_date. Tweezer Reprise x6 at SPAC now counts as 1.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
fix: deduplicate song counts per show, not per performance row (green)

computeSongFrequency now counts distinct shows per song using a
Set<showDate>. SQL queryTopSongs uses subquery with GROUP BY
song_name, show_date. Tweezer Reprise x6 at SPAC now counts as 1.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: wire up App with SQLite-backed API via Vite plugin

- Added Vite server plugin that serves /api/* routes from SQLite DB
- App.tsx fetches stats, top songs, year stats from API endpoints
- Scrape script writes data incrementally to SQLite (data/phstats.db)
- Refresh button to see data as scraping progresses
- Removed JSON export approach in favor of direct DB reads
- Installed better-sqlite3 for Node-side SQLite access

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: expand DataTables to show all rows before scraping (green)

Uses jQuery DataTables API page.len(-1).draw() to display all rows
instead of the default 100. Gets all 149 shows for the user.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: fix setlist scraper for real phish.net HTML (green)

Use <span class="set-label"> instead of <b> for set labels. Detect
jamchart songs via data-original-title attribute. All 90 tests pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: fix setlist scraper for real phish.net HTML (green)

Use <span class="set-label"> instead of <b> for set labels. Detect
jamchart songs via data-original-title attribute. All 90 tests pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: update setlist fixtures to match real phish.net HTML (red)

Real page uses <span class="set-label"> not <b> for set labels, and
class="setlist-song" on links. Jamchart songs have data-original-title
attribute. 6 tests now fail against old scraper implementation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
fix: align scrapers with real phish.net HTML structure

Real phish.net uses YYYY-MM-DD dates (not MM/DD/YYYY) and "City, ST"
locations (no country). Removed parseUSDate, simplified parseLocation,
updated all test fixtures to match actual page structure. Added
scrape-2025.ts script for live data collection.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
refactor: switch orchestrator + hook from API to Playwright scraper

Orchestrator now imports from phishnet-scraper instead of phishnet,
removing the PhishNetConfig/apiKey dependency entirely. Hook signature
simplified to just useUserStats(username). Browser cleanup via
closeBrowser() in finally block. 89 tests passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
refactor: switch orchestrator + hook from API to Playwright scraper

Orchestrator now imports from phishnet-scraper instead of phishnet,
removing the PhishNetConfig/apiKey dependency entirely. Hook signature
simplified to just useUserStats(username). Browser cleanup via
closeBrowser() in finally block. 89 tests passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement Playwright-based phish.net scraper shell client

Replaces fetch-based API calls with Playwright headless browser to
handle phish.net's DataTables JS rendering. Uses shared browser
instance, delegates HTML parsing to pure cheerio scrapers in core.
89 tests passing across 8 test files.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: add failing tests for phishnet-scraper shell client (red)

4 tests for fetchUserShowsScrape and fetchSetlistScrape which
fetch HTML from phish.net and delegate to pure scraper parsers.
Replaces API-based phishnet.ts for data fetching.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement phish.net HTML scrapers with cheerio (green) scrapeUserShows parses the #phish-shows table from /user/{name}/shows. scrapeSetlist extracts songs from setlist pages by finding

tags with bold set labels and /song/ links. Both are pure functions. 87 tests passing across 7 test files. Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: add failing tests for phish.net HTML scrapers (red)

11 tests for scrapeUserShows and scrapeSetlist pure functions
that will parse phish.net HTML pages instead of using the API
(API key generation is broken). Also adds cheerio dependency.

author: Robert Grayson
message:
docs: rewrite PLAN.md with full project architecture and status

Comprehensive plan covering stack, architecture (functional core /
imperative shell), both API data sources, all implemented functions
with status tables, lyrics DB plans, and D3.js visualization roadmap.
76 tests across 6 files, all passing.

author: Robert Grayson

author: Robert Grayson

Wires phish.net and phish.in API clients together: fetches shows,
then parallelizes setlist + track fetching per show via Promise.all,
and delegates to computeUserStats for pure computation.
72 tests passing across 5 test files.

Composes groupShowsByYear, computeYearStats, and computeSongFrequency
to build a complete UserStats object from shows, performances, and

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement API response parsers (green)

Three pure parsers converting raw API JSON to core types:
- parsePhishNetShows: deduplicates attendance entries into Show[]
- parsePhishNetSetlist: converts setlist entries to SongPerformance[]
  with proper set labels (Set 1, Encore, Encore 2)
- parsePhishInTracks: maps phish.in track data to Track[]
All 67 tests passing (10 new + 57 existing).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: add failing tests for API response parsers (red)

Tests for three pure parsers that convert raw API JSON to core types:
- parsePhishNetShows: attendance response -> Show[]
- parsePhishNetSetlist: setlist response -> SongPerformance[]
- parsePhishInTracks: phish.in tracks -> Track[]
10 new failing tests.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement computeShowDurationRank (green)

Ranks shows by total track duration, aggregating from phish.in track data.
Returns sorted longest-first with show metadata and track count.
All 22 tests now passing.

author: Robert Grayson
message:

Organizes tracks by set name, sorted by position within each set.
Essential for setlist visualization rendering.
All 20 tests now passing.

Counts song play frequency across performances.
Returns sorted by count desc, then alphabetically for tiebreaks.

Finds songs with gaps exceeding a day threshold between performances.
Returns SongGap[] sorted by biggest gap first.
All 14 tests now passing.

author: Robert Grayson
message:

Tests for finding songs with gaps exceeding a threshold:

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement computeYearStats (green)

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement formatDuration (green)

Converts milliseconds to human-readable duration strings.
- Sub-hour: mm:ss (e.g., 3:00, 1:05)
- Hour+: h:mm:ss (e.g., 1:01:01)
All 5 tests now passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
chore: scaffold Vite React-TS project with functional core/imperative shell

Sets up the base project structure:
- Vite + React 19 + TypeScript + Vitest + D3.js
- Functional core (src/core/) for pure data transforms
- Imperative shell (src/shell/) for API, hooks, components
- Path aliases (@core/*, @shell/*) configured
- Test infrastructure with jsdom, testing-library, coverage

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
